original: Zacco, Henrik Yngve, bergsingenjör, överingenjör, Finspång, f. 16/3/06 i Gävle av öv:löjtn. Carl Yngve Z. o. Maria Tholander. G. 35 m. Irma Malm. — Stud:ex. i Gävle 24, ex. v. KTH 29. Anst. v. Finspongs Metallv. A-B (sed. 42 A-B Sv. Metallv.), Fin-spongsverken, sed. 30, avd:ing. där 33, öv:ing. o. verkschef där 41, platschef v. Finspongsverken sed. 43. Led. av byggn :nd sed. 39, v. ordf. 39-46, led. av styr. f, Östgötafbank. avd :kontor i Finspång sed. 44, suppl. i styr. f. Finspångs yrkessk., led. av styr. f. N. Östergötl. bef :utb:fören. Res. t. USA 32, Tyskl., Schw^eiz, Ital., Frankr. o. Engl. Skr.: upps. om rörframställn. i Tekn. Tidskr. 37, i Rörinstallatören 38 samt diskuss:-inlägg om elvärme (i IVAs medd. nr 116). Led. av Sv. tekn:för. o. The Inst. of Metals. RLSF ftjSt.
translated: Zacco, Henrik Yngve, mining engineer, Chief Engineer, Finspång, b. 16/3/06 in Gävle to Lt. Carl Yngve Z. and Maria Tholander. Married in 1935 to Irma Malm. Completed secondary school in Gävle in 1924, graduated from the Royal Institute of Technology in 1929. Employed at Finspång Metallurgical Works Ltd. (later A-B Swedish Metallurgical Works) since 1930, worked as a department engineer from 1933, Chief Engineer and Works Manager from 1941, and Works Manager at Finspång Works since 1943. Member of the Building Committee since 1939, Vice Chairman from 1939-1946, member of the Board for the Östgöta bank's office in Finspång since 1944, substitute member of the Board for Finspång Vocational School, member of the Board for the Northern Östergötland Vocational Training Association. Traveled to the USA in 1932, Germany, Switzerland, Italy, France, and England. Published articles on pipe production in Technical Journal in 1937, in the Pipe Installer in 1938, and participated in discussions on electric heating (in IVA's communications no. 116). Member of the Swedish Engineering Association and The Institute of Metals. Received RLSF ftjSt.
